en.description: I am a final-year B.Tech student majoring in Computer Science and Engineering, deeply passionate about technology and its applications. With a strong interest in both Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning and Web Development, I strive to blend creativity with logic to build meaningful and user-friendly solutions.
Throughout my academic journey, I have worked on various projects that allowed me to explore the power of AI and the versatility of modern web technologies.

My learning approach is hands-on and curiosity-driven. I enjoy solving real-world problems, experimenting with new tools, and continuously upgrading my skills to stay aligned with industry trends. I believe in building clean, scalable, and impactful solutions that serve a purpose beyond the code.
As I step into the next phase of my journey, Iâ€™m excited to take on challenges that push my boundaries and make a real impact through technology.
